comments.text:
Created attachment 546889
Showing the gap and the wrong behaviour.

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

I am closing several tabs (at the end of the tabs list).


Actual results:

The tabs are closing ok creating a gap.


Expected results:

The remaining tabs positions should be updated accordingly.
